message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for $11,000. I think you'll find this price very competitive given its value.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'd like to try to get as close to my target budget of $12,000 as possible.
Bob, I understand your desire to stay within budget, but $9,000 is significantly below its true value. How about we meet in the middle at $10,500?

I understand your perspective on the product's value, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. I'd like to offer $9,800. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal.
